summary: AN ORDINANCE vacating portions of Bell Street, Elliott Avenue, Alaskan Way, Blanchard Street, Lenora Street, Virginia Street, and Pine Street on the Petition of the Port of Seattle, (C.F. Nos. 296649 and 297673, as amended); authorizing the Mayor to execute a Quit Claim Deed for the vacated rights-of-way, accepting easements for the pedestrian overpass at Bell Street and the skybridge at Lenora Street, accepting utility easements; and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith.
